amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that Congress should enact an increase for the period of continued TRICARE coverage of children of members of the uniformed services who die while serving on active duty for a period of more than 30 days and make such increased period applicable to children of members who have died since the commencement of military operations in Afghanistan.

action.text: Amendment SA 565 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator DeWine.

vote.text: Amendment SA 565 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
